update make_department_evaluate
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR},
evaluate_content = #{evaluateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
evaluate_time = #{evaluateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
make_department_id = #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR},
make_department_name = #{makeDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
quality_score = #{qualityScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price_score = #{priceScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
speed_score = #{speedScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
atttitude_score = #{atttitudeScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update make_department_evaluate set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR}, evaluate_content = #{evaluateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate_time = #{evaluateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, make_department_id = #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR}, make_department_name = #{makeDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quality_score = #{qualityScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price_score = #{priceScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, speed_score = #{speedScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, atttitude_score = #{atttitudeScore,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from make_department_evaluate where 1 = 1
and make_department_id = #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR}
order by evaluate_time desc
